scripts.package-extension: cd dist && zip -r ../calert-extension-v$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip . && cd .. && echo 'Extension packaged as calert-extension-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip'
scripts.build-and-serve: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.deploy-netlify: npm run build && npx netlify deploy --dir=dist --prod
scripts.deploy-surge: npm run build && cd dist && echo 'calert-demo.surge.sh' | npx surge .
scripts.zip-extension: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../calert-extension.zip .
